aboutMyLife.title: About
aboutMyLife.about: I'm a Front-end developer. Currently, I have more contact with ReactJS, NextJS, and Styled Components. I am communicative and easily adapt to new routines and processes. I had experience with design methodologies and user interface creation. I made a career transition and my background in the health area made me an empathetic and accessible professional for learning and exchanges.

aboutMyLife.title: Development
aboutMyLife.about: Javascript, HTML and CSS3, React and React Native, NextJS, Typescript, Graphql, TDD: Jest and React Test Library, Clean Code, Styled Components and MaterialUI.

aboutMyLife.title: Design
aboutMyLife.about: Figma, Canva, Sketch, Logo Creation, Design thinking, Usability, Brainstorming, Design Agile and Design Pattern.

experiences.about: Experience as a front-end developer. I work in the creation, development and maintenance of products with different domains. Agile experience. Skills: Javascript, HTML e CSS3, React e React Native, NextJS, Typescript, Graphql, Styled Components e MaterialUI.
